I found this rather confusing and it actually took me quite a bit of time to decipher what's going on here.
I would change userNameRequired to validateUsername. Then change !realm.isRegistrationEmailAsUsername() && userNameRequired to validateUsername, and add !realm.isRegistrationEmailAsUsername() to L90. That'd make it a lot more obvious what's going on IMO.
Sure we can change. But It is just parametrizing whether or not the username is required instead of always obtaining it from the realm. Is that complicated ?
IMO what I suggested would make the code a lot easier to read, and as I said I really did have to dig into this code to understand what was going on as I found it a bit confusing how it is now
